```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(rphylopic)
library(magick)
```

## Using `rphylopic`

```{r}
gf <- name_search("House sparrow", options = "namebankID")[1,]

id <- name_images(uuid = gf$uid[1])

uid <- id$same[[1]]$uid


cat <- rphylopic::image_data(input = uid, size = "thumb")


img <- magick::image_read("http://phylopic.org/assets/images/submissions/c64e59f8-5d99-4cf5-bcfd-c73022e288e2.64.png")

magick::image_fill(img, color = "red")
```
